data.name: Cold Harvest Demo
data.detailed_description: This version allows you to briefly get acquainted with a part of the gameplay of the main game.
data.about_the_game: This version allows you to briefly get acquainted with a part of the gameplay of the main game.
data.short_description: This is a demo version of the Cold Harvest visual novel.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content.
